skills.name: Hypnotic Gaze
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.name: Armored Scales
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Shield] buff on all allies equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP for 3 turns. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Shield +5%
Lvl. 3 Shield +5%
Lvl. 4 Shield +5%
Lvl. 5 Shield +5%

skills.name: Horrid Dreams
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 75% chance against enemies under debuffs.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
